title: JAM SESSIONS (Spontaneous Speaking)
welcome: Welcome! It's time to speak freely. Let's begin with a fun topic!
instruction: Speak for one minute about your favorite food.
prompt_pool: Speak for one minute about your favorite food!
Talk about a memorable trip you took.
Describe your favorite hobby and why you enjoy it.
Explain how you spend your weekends.
Share a story about a time you felt proud.

fields.hint: Share your thoughts clearly. Example: I love painting because it relaxes me.

validation_logic.feedback_pass: Well done! You spoke fluently and clearly.
validation_logic.feedback_fail: Try to be more expressive and stay on topic.
